Dr Mohr: vaccines, flu shots, blood tests, now being done at pharmacies in the U.S. Moving away from hospitals & clinics. #future #health
Dr Mohr: understand how your market analyses and measures cost & value. Hospitals and countries vary enormously. #healthtech
Trends in regulations towards approval with evidence may speed up new medical tech release to market. But other challenges. #future #health
Google took YouTube videos through deep learning and found that cat videos are very important to us! #bigdata #future
Dr Catherine Mohr: we are able to 3D print hollow body parts. 3D printed hip replacements by Ossis NZ. #future #healthtech
Dr Mohr: using fluorescence to show surgeon exactly where cancer is. #future #healthtech
Dr Mohr: dogs are being trained to detect cancer. #future #health
Health tech AI systems will monitor the huge data streams for individual health. #futurehealth Dr Catherine Mohr
Biomarkers genomics proteomics, imaging agents machine vision, robotics regenerated med, 3d printing, personalised med. #healthtech #future
Dr Mohr sees future medical products as wearable tech; point of care becomes where the person is. #futuretech #health
Dr Mohr: World is getting healthier living longer regardless of wealth. Thanks to vaccines, antibiotics, medical advancement. #world health

Kari YouDo: Wellington has small network to tap into eg can use to help immigrant's partner find a job too. #tintalk
NZ doesn't offer the scale or salary that other countries can offer but skilled immigrants like lifestyle, security, non corrupt. #tintalk
@intergen Simon Bright: recognise staff have strong work ethic so choose to add more staff rather make them work harder. #tintalk
Achieving high growth: Raymond @datatorque a good peer culture will self regulate. #tintalk
Kari Reiter YouDo set the bar high for staff and the right people will enjoy the challenge. #tintalk

Have clear career paths for staff so they feel connected to the business. Simon Bright @TeamIntergen #tintalk #staffretention
Key to attracting talent: Simon Bright @TeamIntergen have clear values for potential staff to latch onto. #tintalk
